name: Oh, that Munchausen! - interactive audiobook-game!
description:
HEY EVERYONE!

“Do you remember the tale about the cherry bone? Yes? About the swamp and my pigtail? Also yes? And about the hatchet on the Moon? Do you really remember everything?.. Oh, good for you! But you know what?.. Even if you remember everything, I am going to tell you the whole story again anyway! ”

That is right! The most thrustful person on a planet is back! With ALL of his stories!

Here comes “Oh, that Munchausen!”- the fascinating interactive audiobook-game for kids and adults in which you play the role of the Baron Munchausen’s granddaughter and help your grandfather remember all his stories.

Listen, smile and be surprised, ladies and gentlemen, because absolutely all the original adventures of Baron Munchausen (and even those that you have not heard about yet) are now collected in the one app!

FEATURES!

• The world classic comedy is narrated by the inimitable New Zealand actor Peter Hayden!
• Over 250 beautiful illustrations are made by a honorable artist Andrey Kulagin!
• More than 7 hours of the audiobook! Altogether 70 chapters!
• Interactive elements, surprises and bonus twists!
• Collection of funny goofs!

OUR TEAM!

   

        

THE IDEA IS SMILE!

An amiable humor, secrets, quests and acting skills of the professional narrator will put you in a good mood and make you smile!
Download the audiobook for free and listen to the tales of Baron Munchausen anywhere and anytime !
Listen, play and laugh!

WEBPAGE!

Visit our webpage for more info: thebaronmunchausen.com

Your most truthful storyteller,
Baron von Munchausen.
Oooooo yes! And leave comments!

IT IS OPENED BETA!
THE OFFICIAL RELEASE IS SOON!
JUNE, 14 2020
